## Connect.request() method

Sends a request to the server to retrieve data or perform an action.

**Signature:**

```typescript
request(resourceName: string, params?: RequestParams): Promise<Message>;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

resourceName


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

The name of the resource to request.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

params


</td><td>

[RequestParams](./foundation-comms.requestparams.md)


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ An object containing optional parameters to include in the request.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;[Message](./foundation-comms.message.md)<!-- -->&gt;

A promise that resolves to a Message containing the server's response.
